title: stupid ass suspension
body:
ok riot, so if u acutally saw the gameplay of the game taht u suspended me for anf if u play league ur self u should know wut the fuk that sona was doin.it was bot lane.adn she gave 3 fukin free kills in teh beggining and honestly it wasn't because the other team was good or sona makin a mnistake.it was her jsut being fukin r%%%%%ed.adn teh fukin renketon. useless fukin jg taht only says plz report kasia and sona.like wtf u want from me.i cant play wit this brain dead useless pice of shit supp taht isnt even trying a little bit to come back form the lost.like wtf.adn u suspend me for it?
adn also my other account wetpeen got perm banned for a stupid reason too.u should know how anoying it is when someone spamms the enemyis missing ping.and becuz ezreally wasnt  there me as the veigar support too literally like 2 or 3 cs and he spamm pings and so i said u do it again ill leave lane.adn wich i did.and the reason i dditn this was becuz someone else did this to me when i played adc and i learned a lesson to not spamm ping my supp or anyone but that person didnt get banned but i did.is this some kidn of racist thinng?cuz im korean? fukin unban my fukin acc u trash aaa fukin company wit ripp off dota******{{champion:53}} ******

replies.body: I understood about 25% of this, and it convinced me that you probably deserved it.
